title: Skin
body: So just wondering I got Spirit Guard Udyr and I didn't get the icons or the background for the profile just wondering if that's a bug as well as I have two classic Nami skins

replies.body:
The nami skin bug is a long lasting glitch that hasn't been fixed yet, probably because it is harmless and there are bigger things to fix. 
As for SGU, apparently the icons appear at the bottom of your icon list. They can take up to 48 hours to show up as well. The profile banner only appears when you have one of the SGU icons equipped as your summoner icon.
cheers for the info about nami and i have had SGU for about a week now and still nothing so i was wondering if this was a bug or if anyone else has had this happen to thme and how they fixed it
You could try contacting support and see what they have to say.
